snippet: The move comes after the Dutch electronics giant’s plans to separate itself into two companies: one focused on health care and technology, and another on lighting.
abstract: DealBook Online; Dutch electronics giant Philips says it will spin off its lighting business through initial public offering in early 2016.
lead_paragraph: The move comes after the Dutch electronics giant’s plans to separate itself into two companies: one focused on health care and technology, and another on lighting.

headline.main: Philips to Spin Off Lighting Business in I.P.O.
